```{r message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, paged.print=FALSE}
#PART 1: Read csv, merge, clean.
library(readr)
library(readxl)
library(dplyr)
library(countrycode)

source('Read_Clean.R')
cleaned <- Read_Clean()

#After Cleaning, check how many NA values are in dataset.
cleaned %>%
  select(everything()) %>%
  summarise_all(funs(sum(is.na(.)))) %>% rowSums()
```
